name: Angry Tonks
description:
This game was made for the Staffs Freshers week AM GameJam 2021. 

This is a very serious strategy game and should not be taken lightly in any circumstance! You are controlling tanks, giant vehicles of war, in this game you have the power to rip trees from the ground and topple skyscrapers, so use it wisely! Command air strikes, launch carpet bombers, and fling bowling balls in this highly intense game!

Hope you enjoy!
